Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: There was a tree down blocking most of the trail at around 3:30.  Marv, Vasili and I cleared most of it. Otherwise, the trail in the woods was great, pretty fast. No connector. Had to walk across the golf course

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be packed this morning. All trails are open.
nubsNob.comments: Pintail Peak opens today! We are now open on all of our runs with the exception of the glades and the Big Terrain Park. The Big Park will open tomorrow. Expect variable conditions today as a thaw yesterday has turned into a freeze this morning. The wind is up today and it's snowing hard currently. Our skilled Grooming Crew waited to groom until early this morning to create the best snow surface possible given the conditions. A variety of snow surfaces will be encountered on the slopes today. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. The soup of the day is Clam Chowder. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
